mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_transaction_record ( user_id, product_id, lower_user, transaction_type, pay_type, income_type, transaction_money, transaction_time, transaction_balance, pay_status, third_transaction_record ) VALUES ( #{userId},#{productId},#{lowerUser},#{transactionType},#{payType},#{incomeType},#{ttransactionMoney},now(),#{transactionBalance},#{payStatus},#{thirdTransactionRecord} )
